definition: (cookery) to decorate using a piping bag/to extrude something though a piping bag/piping
to crowd in/to cram in/to force others aside/to press/to squeeze/to find (time in one's busy schedule)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Decorate with whipped cream rosettes and garnish the cherries and chocolate hearts.
sentences.chinese: 表面用奶油擠花，然後放上櫻桃和心形巧克力裝飾。
